RelatedSentence: MAS last Thursday reported its biggest quarterly loss in more than two years , hit by a sharp drop in passenger traffic after what it called the dramatic impact of the MH370 tragedy .

A0: The net loss in the first quarter
RelatedSentence: The net loss in the first quarter expanded to 443.4 million ringgit in the first quarter from 278.8 million ringgit in the same period last year , it said .
For the full year , analysts are forecasting a net loss of around 1 billion ringgit , a slight improvement from 1.17 billion in 2013 .
